ygData.subject: Invitation to join _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I would like to let all magic users know that i created a new mailing list wich talks about many common things to all spell users. The description of
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

I would like to let all magic users know that i created a new mailing list
wich talks about many common things to all spell users.

The description of this mailing list is:

Everquest list for wizards, magicians, enchanters, necromancers and other
magic
using classes (clerics, druids, shamans). where we can excxange info on spells
use, quests, and items related to our class; combat tactics, race diferences,
bugs and new ideas to improve spells and magic and all other related things
are
welcome.

You can join this list by going to the following web page:

http://www.onelist.com/subscribe.cgi/_EQ_Magic

Please read digest so you can contribute to last discussions.


If you do not wish to join this list, please ignore this message.


Thanks,

wizard@...
List Owner
